title: Giveaway- Last Call.

embed.description: TLDR: Create a story, league based. I wont accept anything that's Sexualized the rest of the internet has that covered. You get bonus points, if a @Rioter likes your story. I will choose my fav one from the boards and on reddit. (https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4919x6/giveaway

body:
Reddit link- Which no one has used yet XD
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4919x6/giveaway_10_riot_points_oce/

Read Rules on how to try and win.

You have untill late tomorrow (10th).
For me, I will select the winner either around 8 PM.
Or if Im having trouble deciding.
Early on the 11th.

replies.body: Don't worry Yasei, I hope I won't let you down, I've got a story I'm trying to complete, need a bit longer on it.
